title: Strengths and Values
milestoneGoal: Taking the time to understand the specifics of what we have to offer the world can build confidence.

content.content: Choose one of these activities to get started on your Strengths and Values milestone:

As we’ve said before, you’re more than what you do for work. It’s important to recognize this and consider your whole self.

Our character traits — like our sense of humor or honesty — are part of what make us valuable employees. While these traits may be a little harder to identify than your Microsoft Excel skills, it’s worth the effort.

Know what you have to offer. The activities here aren’t just feel-good exercises. (Although hopefully you’ll enjoy them!) When you understand your strengths and values, you’ll have more ways to highlight your unique abilities to potential employers.
